TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SiteMapPath extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.CompositeControl

summary.span: Displays a set of text or image hyperlinks that enable users to more easily navigate a Web site, while taking a minimal amount of page space.

span.span: Displays a set of text or image hyperlinks that enable users to more easily navigate a Web site, while taking a minimal amount of page space.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [節點Nodes](#nodes) - [節點的外觀Node Appearance](#node_appearance) - [事件Events](#events) - [自訂 SiteMapPath 控制項Customizing the SiteMapPath Control](#customizing_the_sitemappath_control) - [協助工具選項Accessibility](#accessibility) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction 控制項是站台導覽控制項，以反映所提供的資料物件。The control is a site navigation control that reflects data provided by the object. 它提供節省空間的方式，輕鬆地瀏覽網站，並做為參考目前顯示的網頁所在站台內的點。It provides a space-saving way to easily navigate a site and serves as a point of reference for where the currently displayed page is within a site. 這種類型的控制項通常稱為階層連結或置頂路徑，因為它會顯示可從目前位置的頁面階層中往上逸出的超連結的頁面名稱的階層式路徑。This type of control is commonly called a breadcrumb, or eyebrow, because it displays a hierarchical path of hyperlinked page names that provides an escape up the hierarchy of pages from the current location. .. 適用於站台具有深度階層式頁面結構，但是 where或可能需要在頁面上的太多空間。The is useful for sites that have deep hierarchical page structures, but where a or might require too much space on a page. 控制項適用於直接與您的網站的站台對應資料。The control works directly with your Web site's site map data. 如果您在使用它並不會呈現在頁面上您的站台對應，它將不會顯示。If you use it on a page that is not represented in your site map, it will not be displayed. 如需有關站台對應的詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 網站巡覽](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/23de8a05-cac3-4693-b508-39f1d4b7053d)。For more information about site maps, see [ASP.NET Site Navigation](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/23de8a05-cac3-4693-b508-39f1d4b7053d). ## 節點Nodes 個節點組成。The is made up of nodes. 在路徑中的每個項目都稱為節點，而且會以表示物件。Each element in the path is called a node and is represented by a object. 錨定的路徑，而代表階層樹狀結構的基底的節點稱為根節點。The node that anchors the path and represents the base of the hierarchical tree is called the root node. 表示目前顯示的網頁的節點是目前的節點。The node that represents the currently displayed page is the current node. 目前的節點與根節點之間的任何其他節點是父節點。Any other node between the current node and root node is a parent node. 下表描述三種不同的節點類型。The following table describes the three different node types. |節點類型Node type|描述Description| |---------------|-----------------| |根root|錨定一組階層式節點的節點。A node that anchors a hierarchical set of nodes.| |父代parent|有一個以上的子節點，但不是目前節點的節點。A node that has one or more child nodes, but is not the current node.| |目前的current|表示目前顯示的網頁的節點。A node that represents the currently displayed page.| ## 節點的外觀Node Appearance 顯示每個節點已或控制項，您可以套用範本，或若要設定樣式。Each node displayed by a is a or control that you can apply a template or style to. 範本和樣式會套用到根據兩個規則的優先順序的節點：The templates and styles are applied to nodes according to two rules of precedence: - 如果範本定義的節點，它會覆寫任何節點所定義的樣式。If a template is defined for a node, it overrides any style defined for the node. - 範本和樣式的節點類型而異的覆寫一般範本和樣式定義的所有節點。Templates and styles that are specific to types of nodes override general templates and styles defined for all nodes. 和屬性會套用至所有節點，不論其節點型別。The and properties are applied to all nodes, regardless of their node type. 如果這兩個這些屬性定義，會優先使用。If both these properties are defined, the takes precedence. 和屬性會套用至節點，代表目前顯示的頁面。The and properties are applied to nodes that represent the currently displayed page. 如果定義除了，則會忽略它。If a is defined in addition to the , it is ignored. 如果定義除了，它會與合併建立合併的樣式。If a is defined in addition to the , it is merged with the to create a merged style. 這個合併的樣式使用的所有項目，再加上的任何其他項目，不會衝突。This merged style uses all the elements of the , plus any additional elements of the that do not conflict with the . 和屬性會套用至表示網站巡覽階層架構的根節點。The and properties are applied to the node that represents the root of the site navigation hierarchy. 如果定義除了，則會忽略它。If a is defined in addition to the , it is ignored. 如果定義除了，它會與合併建立合併的樣式。If a is defined in addition to the , it is merged with the to create a merged style. 這個合併的樣式使用的所有項目，再加上的任何其他項目未不衝突的。This merged style uses all the elements of the , plus any additional elements of the that did not conflict with the . 最後，如果目前顯示的頁面是根頁面的 「 網站 」並來取代或。Finally, if the currently displayed page is the root page of the site, the and are used instead of the or . 控制項會使用網站導覽提供者所識別當成資料來源的網站瀏覽資訊的屬性。The control uses the site map provider identified by the property as its data source for site navigation information. 如果未不指定任何提供者，它會使用預設提供者的網站，在識別屬性。If no provider is specified, it uses the default provider for the site, identified in the property. 一般而言，這是 ASP.NET 預設網站導覽提供者的執行個體。Typically, this is an instance of the default site map provider for ASP.NET, the . 如果控制項可在網站內，但沒有網站導覽提供者已設定，控制項就會擲回例外狀況。If the control is used within a site but no site map provider is configured, the control throws an exception. ## 事件Events 控制項也會提供您可以程式設計的事件。The control also provides events that you can program against. 這可讓您執行自訂的常式，每當事件發生時。This allows you to run a custom routine whenever an event occurs. 下表列出支援的事件控制項。The following table lists the events supported by the control. |Event - 事件Event|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||發生時控制項會先建立並將它與相關聯。Occurs when the control first creates a and associates it with a .| ||發生時繫結至網站所包含的地圖資料。Occurs when a is bound to site map data contained by the .| ## 自訂 SiteMapPath 控制項Customizing the SiteMapPath Control 衍生自類別覆寫方法，以自訂瀏覽控制項所包含的控制項。Classes that derive from override the method to customize the controls contained by the navigation control. 針對 完整控制的方式會建立物件，並將其加入衍生類別覆寫方法。For complete control over the way objects are created and added to the , derived classes override the method. ## 協助工具選項Accessibility 如需如何設定這個控制項，使其產生符合協助工具標準的標記資訊，請參閱[協助工具的 Visual Studio 及 ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13)和[ASP.NET 控制項和協助工具](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0).For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7e3ce9c4-6b7d-4fb1-94b5-72cf2a44fe13) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/847a37e3-ce20-41da-b0d3-7dfb0fdae9a0). ## 宣告式語法Declarative Syntax ``` ``` ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用以宣告方式在 Web Form 網頁的控制項。The following code example uses a control declaratively in a Web Forms page. 此範例示範一些控制與範本和樣式會套用至之順序的優先順序規則節點。This example demonstrates some of the rules of precedence that govern the order with which templates and styles are applied to nodes. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_5#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_5/CS/webform2navpathcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_5#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_5/VB/webform2navpathvb.aspx#1)] 先前的範例會使用預設網站導覽提供者和 Web.sitemap 檔案具有下列結構。The previous example uses the default site map provider and a Web.sitemap file with the following structure. ``` ``` 下列程式碼範例示範如何擴充控制項，並將加入其中的新功能，藉由覆寫方法。The following code example demonstrates extends the control and adds new functionality to it by overriding the method. `DropDownSiteMapPath`控制項會新增之後目前的節點，讓您輕鬆瀏覽子節點的目前頁面的頁面。The `DropDownSiteMapPath` control adds a after the current node, to enable easy navigation to pages that are child nodes of the current page. 此範例示範如何使用物件，包括檢查其，然後呼叫方法之後建立的項目。This example demonstrates how to work with objects, including checking their and calling the method after the items are created. [!code-csharp[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.DropDownNavigationPath_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.DropDownNavigationPath_1/CS/dropdownnavigationpath.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.DropDownNavigationPath_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/Urtue.Samples.Alexkr.DropDownNavigationPath_1/VB/dropdownnavigationpath.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式來建立和初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 若要動態方式加入控制項加入頁面中，建立新物件，設定其屬性，然後再將它加入這類容器控制項的集合。To dynamically add a control to a page, create a new object, set its properties, and then add it to the collection of a container control such as . ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用建構函式來加入至網頁的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the constructor to add a control to a page. 針對此範例才能運作，您需要將映像新增至您的根目錄，並將變更從 「 myimage.jpg 」 的映像檔案名稱的範例程式碼中的映像名稱。For the example to work, you need to add an image to your root directory and change the image name in the example code from "myimage.jpg" to the name of your image file. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_3#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_3/CS/aboutus2cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_3#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.NavigationPath_decl_3/VB/aboutus2vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會建立控制項，將它們與對應關聯物件從目前網站導覽提供者，並新增至節點集合。The method creates controls, associates them with the corresponding objects from the current site map provider, and adds the nodes to the collection. 方法會先尋找，然後逐步解說如何的階層式樹狀結構中向上建立的物件之前，每個為止。The method begins by finding the , and then walks up the hierarchical tree of objects, creating a for each one until the is reached. 在每個建立時，之前它繫結至其相對應，則呼叫方法。After each is created, but before it is bound to its corresponding , the method is called. 方法僅適用於任何範本或定義特定節點類型的樣式會建立和初始化任何子控制項包含。The method applies any templates or styles defined for a particular node type and creates and initializes any child controls that the contains. 最後，方法會將加入的子控制項到集合。Finally, the method adds the child controls of the to the collection. 在每個初始化時，呼叫方法。After each is initialized, the method is called. 然後繫結至其相對應，和呼叫。Then the is bound to its corresponding , and is called. 方法從呼叫方法。The method is called from the method. 擴充的類別控制覆寫方法以改變如何建立或加入至控制項控制項。Classes that extend the control override the method to alter how the controls are created or added to the control. 在中執行的個別節點的項目操作方法，並擴充的大部分類別覆寫該方法只能。The manipulation of individual node items is performed in the method, and most classes that extend override that method only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制代表目前顯示的頁面之巡覽路徑節點的顯示文字的外觀。Use the property to control the appearance of the display text for the navigation path node that represents the currently displayed page. 根據預設，顯示的文字是在中指定屬性表示網頁。By default, the display text is that specified in the property of the that represents the page. 常見的樣式設定包含自訂的背景色彩、 前景色彩、 字型屬性和節點的間距。Common style settings include custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing. 針對樣式屬性的節點會合併成單一的樣式，以下列順序：For nodes, style properties are merged into a single style, in the following order: 1. 2. 或者，如果目前顯示的頁面是 [根] 節點中， 。 or, if the currently displayed page is the root node, . > [!NOTE] > 除非明確設定為，如果您將節點的字型樣式設定刪除線或頂線的樣式時，不顯示節點的預設底線樣式`true`。If you set the node font style to a strikeout or overline style, the default underline style of the node is not displayed unless it is explicitly set to `true`. 如果屬性定義，屬性會被忽略。If a property is defined, the property is ignored. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式設定的Web Forms 網頁中的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively set the of a control in a Web Forms page. remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定要若要使用的物件控制項或其他控制項，例如，作為目前節點的使用者介面項目，而非字串。Set the to an object to use an control or some other control, such as a , as the current node's user interface element instead of a string. 如果屬性設定時，範本會覆寫目前的瀏覽節點文字顯示，與任何套用到它。If the property is set, the template overrides both the current navigation node text displayed and any applied to it. 在目前顯示的頁面對應到根節點，不過，如果或用。If the currently displayed page corresponds to the root node, however, the or is used. 您可以宣告一組屬性設為任何 Web 伺服器控制項，並在 ASP.NET 基礎結構會執行必要的步驟，以包裝為 Web 伺服器控制項物件。You can declaratively set the property to any Web server control, and the ASP.NET infrastructure performs the necessary steps to wrap the Web server control as an object. 不過，Web 伺服器控制項不會實作介面; 因此，當您使用屬性以程式設計的方式，您必須撰寫任何範本程式碼包裝函式。However, Web server controls do not implement the interface; therefore, when you work with the properties programmatically, you must write an wrapper for any template code. 然後，屬性設定為執行個體包裝函式。Then, the property is set to an instance of the wrapper. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會以宣告方式定義，並覆寫定義。The following code example declaratively defines a and overrides a defined . remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性來控制所有控制項所呈現巡覽路徑節點的顯示文字的外觀。Use the property to control the appearance of the display text for all navigation path nodes rendered by the control. 根據預設，顯示的文字是在中指定屬性表示網頁。By default, the display text is that specified in the property of the that represents the page. 常見的樣式設定包含自訂的背景色彩、 前景色彩、 字型屬性和節點的間距。Common style settings include custom background color, foreground color, font properties, and node spacing. 針對樣式屬性的節點會合併成單一的樣式，以下列順序：For nodes, style properties are merged into a single style, in the following order: 1. 2. 或，取決於節點類型。 or , depending on the node type. > [!NOTE] > 除非明確設定為，如果您將節點的字型樣式設定刪除線或頂線的樣式時，不顯示節點的預設底線樣式`true`。If you set the node font style to a strikeout or overline style, the default underline style of the node is not displayed unless it is explicitly set to `true`. 如果是定義，它一開始會套用到每個節點。If the is defined, it is initially applied to each node. 如果其他的樣式定義的特定類型的節點，例如根節點或目前的節點，此樣式會取代在指定的一般樣式屬性。If an additional style is defined for a particular type of node, such as the root node or current node, this style supersedes the general style specified in the property. 如果範本會定義特定類型的節點，它會取代該節點的所有已定義的樣式。If a template is defined for a particular type of node, it supersedes all defined styles for that node. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何定義，會與合併示範的樣式優先順序節點。The following code example demonstrates how to define a that is merged with a to demonstrate the order of style precedence for the nodes. remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定要若要使用的物件或其他控制項，例如，做為所有的巡覽路徑節點的使用者介面項目。Set the to an object to use an or some other control, such as a , as a user interface element for all navigation path nodes. 如果屬性設定時，範本會覆寫顯示在瀏覽節點文字和任何套用到它。If the property is set, the template overrides both the navigation node text displayed and any applied to it. 目前和根節點，如果或是設定，這些範本會覆寫。For the current and root nodes, if a or is set, these templates override the . 您可以宣告一組屬性設為任何 Web 伺服器控制項，並在 ASP.NET 基礎結構會執行必要的步驟，以包裝為 Web 伺服器控制項物件。You can declaratively set the property to any Web server control, and the ASP.NET infrastructure performs the necessary steps to wrap the Web server control as an object. 不過，Web 伺服器控制項不會實作介面; 因此，當您使用屬性以程式設計的方式，您必須撰寫任何範本程式碼包裝函式。However, Web server controls do not implement the interface; therefore, when you work with the properties programmatically, you must write an wrapper for any template code. 然後，屬性設定為執行個體包裝函式。Then, the property is set to an instance of the wrapper. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何，當有指定，會覆寫針對所有節點，包括根節點和目前節點的特殊樣式定義的樣式。The following code example demonstrates how a , when one is specified, overrides styles defined for all nodes, including special styles for the root node and current node. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件引發之後控制項會建立，這是 Web 伺服器控制項，表示，並將其相關聯。The event is raised after the control creates a , which is a Web server control that represents a , and associates it to a . 建立的節點項目繫結至其資料之前，會呼叫方法。The method is called before the created node item is bound to its data. 這可讓您提供事件處理方法會執行自訂的常式，每當建立。This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever a is created. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何呼叫方法之後建立內方法。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method after creating a within the method. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定至如果您想要顯示巡覽路徑，從左到右; 導覽路徑會顯示為進展從左到右的網站導覽節點。Set to if you want to display the navigation path from left to right; the navigation path appears as a progression from left to right of site map nodes. 換句話說，根節點是位於最左邊位置的每個後續節點到右方時下, 一個位置，是目前節點是在最右邊的位置。In other words, the root node is at the leftmost position, each subsequent node is in the next position to the right, and the current node is in the rightmost position. 設定至如果您想要顯示由右至左的導覽路徑。Set to if you want to display the navigation path from right to left. 也就是說，節點順序會顛倒，因此根節點會顯示在右邊的位置和目前的節點會顯示在左邊的位置。In other words, the node order is reversed so that the root node displays at the rightmost position and the current node displays at the leftmost position. 雖然不是常見的這種排序可用於當地語系化 Web Form 頁面和控制項由右至左讀取的語言。While not as common, this ordering can be used for localizing Web Forms pages and the control for languages that read from right to left. 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式設定屬性Web Forms 網頁中。The following code example demonstrates how to declaratively set the property of a in a Web Forms page. remarks.format: ## Remarks 是您可以將它設定為讓網頁更多或更少存取的螢幕助讀程式使用者的屬性。 is a property that you can set to make a Web page more or less accessible to users of screen readers. 包含多個頁面，例如顯示的網站導覽資料的控制項的重複內容的網站可以提供一種機制，可讓螢幕助讀員略過重複的內容，因此無法大聲閱讀的使用者。Web sites that contain content that repeats on multiple pages, such as controls that display site map data, can provide a mechanism that allows users of screen readers to skip the repeated content so that it is not read aloud. 控制項提供方式由螢幕助讀員略過整個控制項的屬性。The control provides the property as a way for the entire control to be skipped by screen readers. 如果屬性設定，呈現替代文字的不可見影像，讓使用者選擇跳到內容的結尾。If the property is set, an invisible image with alternate text is rendered, giving the user the option to jump to the end of the content. 螢幕助讀程式會大聲閱讀的替代文字，但映像不會干擾網頁的視覺化的流程。Screen readers read the alternate text aloud but the image does not disturb the visual flow of the page. 屬性是設定為"Skip Navigation Links"，根據預設，讓螢幕助讀員略過控制項。The property is set to "Skip Navigation Links" by default, which makes screen readers skip the control. 如果您想要停用此行為，將屬性設定為。If you want to disable this behavior, set the property to . 這個屬性的值會儲存檢視狀態中。The value of this property is stored in view state. 此屬性的值設定時，可以自動儲存到資源檔使用設計工具。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[全球化和當地語系化](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d)。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ef3838e-9d05-4236-9dd0-ceecff9df80d).
